code: import{createSelector}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var selectState=function selectState(state){return state;};export var selectCurrentQuestion=createSelector(selectState,function(state){return state.currentQuestion;});export var selectCurrentIndex=createSelector(selectState,function(state){return state.currentIndex;});export var selectTotalScore=createSelector(selectState,function(state){return state.totalScore;});export var selectNumberOfAnswers=createSelector(selectState,function(state){return state.numberOfCorrectAnswers;});
